## Rango
$$R = Max_{x} - Min_{x}$$

## Rango intercuartilico
$$ RQ = Q_{3} - Q_{1} $$

## Varianza
$$ \sigma^{2} = \frac{ \sum_{i=1}^{N} ( {x_{i} - \overline{X}} ) }{N} $$

## Desviación estandar o tipica
$$ \sigma = \sqrt{ \frac{ \sum_{i=1}^{N} ( {x_{i} - \overline{X}} ) }{N} }$$

## Coeficiente de variación
$$ CV = \frac {\sigma_{x}} {\overline{X}} $$
